body_html: Interesting -- we should support r3 just fine (assuming you installed it from sources and said cudnn r3 during ./configure). Thanks for the report, hopefully this is useful for others that run into this.
body_text: Interesting -- we should support r3 just fine (assuming you installed it from sources and said cudnn r3 during ./configure).  Thanks for the report, hopefully this is useful for others that run into this.
